data.name: ARIA CHRONICLE - Invoker
data.detailed_description:
Please welcome Invoker, the newest hero of Aria Chronicle!

Invoker can now be found at the Latebra Tavern.

The insidious Invoker summons familiars and casts powerful magic.
It can utilize a single turn to gather arcane power to summon a trustworthy familiar,
or it can fire arcane arrows that deal enormous damage while stunning enemies.
The Invoker is a versatile hero, adept at binding enemies to steal their attributes
or buffing allies with Spirit Link.



DLC content
Added a new job, the Invoker.
On your first visit to the tavern, the Invoker is guaranteed to appear in the hire list.
Also, the Invoker will be added to the list of characters that Aria can select from.

data.short_description: The insidious Invoker summons familiars and casts powerful magic. It can utilize a single turn to gather arcane power to summon a trustworthy familiar, or it can fire arcane arrows that deal enormous damage while stunning enemies.
data.supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G630 @ 2.70GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
